title: The Asset Allocator: Should Young Investors Hold 100% Equity Portfolios?
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Stocks’ higher expected returns, the fact that markets recover and stocks’ tax advantages are some of the reasons offered by proponents of a 100 percent stock portfolio, especially for those with long time horizons. This podcast (5:06) argues that while such a portfolio may be advantageous theoretically, financial advisors must remain rooted firmly in the realm of empirical experience, which is at odds with an overly aggressive investment approach.
